synopsis.text: After spotting a captivating girl on his daily train commute to school, the timid high school student Makoto Itou finds himself too shy to approach her. Fortunately for him, his outgoing classmate Sekai Saionji takes notice of his secret crush and decides to intervene. As Sekai helps Makoto and the object of his affection, Kotonoha, grow closer, a complex web of emotions begins to unfold. Little does Makoto know that Sekai harbors feelings for him as well, setting the stage for a dramatic love triangle. This enthralling tale of love, friendship, and betrayal unfolds in "School Days," a story that has captivated audiences as both a dating sim and an anime series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
